DOC.criteria: woman 15 45 year old genital activity stable weight previous 3 month BMI 20 28 regular menstrual cycle ( 28 +/ 2 day ) previous 3 month reliable mean contraception ( systemic hormonal contraception , intrauterine contraceptive device , tubal ligation ) use way contraception previous 3 month normal clinical examination able compliant schedule protocol assessment willing able provide write informed consent affiliate National Health Service agree registered national file subject participate biomedical research Exclusions relate significant medical disturbance : type I II diabetes early menopause serious psychological disorder uncontrolled thyroid disorder know allergy local anesthetic especially Xylocaine abnormal laboratory result medical history , opinion investigator , make subject unsuitable enrollment positive test result HIV , HCV and/or HBV virus positive pregnancy test Exclusions relate subject lifestyle : smoking > 10 cigarette per day smoke cessation previous 3 month weight fluctuation ( > 3kg ) previous 3 month alcohol abuse coffee tea consumption > 6 cup per day high consumption drink comprise xanthine base ( > 0.5 liters/day ) consumption drink ( water herbal tea ) > 2 liter per day Exclusions relate previous concomitant treatment : anticoagulant neuroleptic antidepressant medication draining , lipolytic , appetite suppressant and/or slimming effect local systemic corticosteroid therapy test area hormonal treatment contraception diuretic local treatment cellulitis ( mesotherapy , phosphatidylcholine injection , mechanical process ) thighs liposuction < 2 year chronic treatment antiinflammatory Exclusions relate subject : unwillingness inability comply requirement protocol previous participation clinical trial within 30 day inability understand sign consent due linguistic psychic issue subject deprive liberty guardianship , tutorship judicial protection female currently pregnant breastfeed female consider become pregnant study
